title: The Consensus Awakening
story_summary: A sudden broadcast declares that consensus is broken. Confusion spreads as people gather in local assemblies and create their own rules. The Council loses control while neighborhoods form new charters. Quietly, signs suggest Halden planned this all along. The city is no longer one system but many.

official.headline: Consensus recalibrated
official.anchor_line: A synchronized citywide broadcast encourages all citizens to participate in the evolving collective dialogue.
official.contextual_reframing: This initiative reaffirms the system's commitment to transparency and adaptive governance.

official.headline: Community assemblies form
official.anchor_line: Neighborhood groups convene to explore local self-organization, fostering new social connections.
official.contextual_reframing: Citizen involvement strengthens unity and demonstrates the resilience of Stenograd's social infrastructure.

official.headline: A new beginning emerges
official.anchor_line: Districts announce their independent charters as consensus gives way to diverse self-government.
official.contextual_reframing: Stenograd transitions to a new era of participatory frameworks with stability and optimism.

underground.headline: Broken silence
underground.anchor_line: 'Truth is consensus?' The system admits the obvious as fractured broadcasts hit every screen.
underground.contextual_reframing: Cracks in the official signal show what happens when those in charge lose control.

underground.headline: Assemblies rise up
underground.anchor_line: Neighbors meet in secret, writing their own rules as trust in the BCI collapses overnight.
underground.contextual_reframing: Self-organization isn't chaos. It's survival after the algorithm fails to protect us.

underground.headline: The system lets go
underground.anchor_line: Districts split off. The shiny promise of unity dies, replaced by real voices and raw choices.
underground.contextual_reframing: From fragments, something freer might be born. Watch closely - the old order ends here.
